channel.title: Comments on: The Cure Add “Reflections” Concerts Stateside, Call Out R&R Hall of Fame

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: haha. no and yes. the "girl" is roger o'donnell. and that is indeed lol.
item.content:encoded: haha. no and yes. the “girl” is roger o’donnell. and that is indeed lol.

item.title: By: Todd A
item.dc:creator: Todd A
item.description: Is there a girl in the Cure now? And is that Lol on the end?
item.content:encoded: Is there a girl in the Cure now? And is that Lol on the end?
